description:
Attaching a volume to a LXC instance fails because the following command is not permitted to run as "root":

In nova/virt/disk/api.py:

    utils.execute('touch', target, run_as_root=True)

Solution 1:

Add the "touch" command in the compute rootwrap filters file:

In nova/rootwrap/compute.py:

Add:

    filters.CommandFilter("/bin/touch", "root"),

Solution 2:

Use "tee" (which is already allowed) in place of "touch".

I am running nova essex rc1 under ubuntu precise beta.
title: Cannot attach volumes to LXC instances
